summary: 2012 FORD FOCUS, AUTOMATIC TRANS. THE CLUTCHES DISENGAGED DURING ACCELERATION, THIS TIME WHILE MAKING A LEFT TURN IN FRONT OF ONCOMING TRAFFIC. CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. THEN THE CAR HAS ERRATIC SHIFTING, CLUTCHES ENGAGING AND DISENGAGING WHILE DRIVING, HIGH RPMS. THIS TIME TAKEN TO DEALER FOR SAME ISSUE .DEALER REPROGRAMMED THE CONTROL MODULE AGAIN. THERE ARE MANY COMPLAINTS ABOUT THE TRANS ON FOCUSFANATICS.COM.  *TR
